review: It's an nice app overall. I liked it's design and how cute it is. But there are somethings that need to be changed. First of all, if you start an 60m, and complete the task within 55m and you end the session, then all your progress goes away and it isn't tracked. You have to complete the pomodoro. Secondly, when you complete the task, you cannot edit it. If you click on done by mistake, you cannot undo it. You will have to redo it. That's all. Please make the changes asap

This app is really good and it helps me in being organised. It has a really aesthetic feel to it, which I really love. I'm looking for the dark mode and it does not seem to be available in this app. Also, the screen doesn't stay awake while the timer is ongoing. Lastly, you can't stop the timer midway and if you do, this progress is not counted. If these 3 problems of mine are solved, this app is going to be super perfect. ü™ê

The app is almost perfect, I love the aesthetic and the interface. It looks really calming and I love the audio. Although I wish it has repeating task option so that I don't have to write them down every single day. One more problem is that it won't save your stats if you stop halfway through but that's not a really big issue for me, it is a little annoying sometimes when I finish my task early and it doesn't save. I see a lot of potential on this app, so I will keep on using it for now.

I love it! I really do, from the aesthetic feel, the automatic breaks and the todo list, it's a really good app. But I'm only giving three stars for now because there is much room for imrpovement. We should be able to edit/delete a task, and it would also be nice to be able to set a goal time for each task. It would also be nice to see a history of completed tasks because that can give a sense of accomplishment

App has a really cool function, super helpful when studying. It glitches sometimes. I don't that if I skip the break multiple times, the next time the work period cycles, I don't get a break. Sometimes, the app does not notify me when the work period is over, even if it is running. I also wish there was the option to add tasks while the timer is running, sometimes tasks pop up throughout the day and I don't want to restart the timer everytime I want to add a new task.

This app is amazing!!! The aesthetic is great, the clock doesn't fluctuate when I leave the app temporarily, it gives you steps to focus, there are sounds on it that makes it easier to concentrate. Best app for productivity out there and I have had my fair share of failures. Keep it up. And the ads are not overbearing. I would like to however make a suggestion to have a dark mode and to also have something to distract people less while on their phone.

This is a really nice productivity app! A couple options that might be nice is a way to repeat tasks daily or weekly or something, & also the option to stop the timer part way through. The lowest setting is 20 minutes, but sometimes I finish the task in less than 20 minutes. But if you back out or stop the timer, it just resets & you lose that progress & it's not recorded in stats. Also an option to add time manually if I forgot to start the timer would be really nice.

Beautiful interface, doesn't try to do too much. This would be the pomodoro tracker I was looking for *if* I could buy an ad-free version. I'm about to spend $9 for the full version of a competitor that I would happily pay for an ad-free experience. Update: increasing score to 4 stars for a prompt response from an interested development team promising a product that would address my needs

This app is definitely one of the better ones, plus, it's so aesthetic! I love that there's a built in timer. Could you make it so that swiping right marks it as complete and left as remove instead of both directions being remove? Also, a calendar would be very useful, as you can then plan what you need to do on what days.

This is a totally amazing app all around and I'm using it everyday, and the UI is phenomenal, but can we please get a fix for the timer page? The buttons are too close to each other, the pause/resume button has basically stuck below the circular time progress. Sorry but as a designer it irritates me a lot, if we get a fix for that it would be the best app ever for me.

This app is probably the best one out there. It is sooo soo helpful to keep on task and be productive. I love the timer option that includes white noise. I usually use the timer and white noise while working and it helps me focus sooo much. If I could, I would rate this app a 10/5. But, I can't. I recommended it to all the fellow users out there looking for a great app you help with productivity. ‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê

super nice and easy to use, but it doesn't appear to have an alarm function? I find myself going over the allotted time constantly because the app won't give any indication it's done despite having notifications and vibrations on. There's also no way to undo accidentally finishing a task, sad because this is by far the best looking and feeling study timer app.

Brilliant. Extremely intuitive, all the functionality you need, and an aesthetic masterpiece! The only well designed app on the entire store. So clean and pretty. Very very enjoyable to work with. For potential future features, I would love to see one or two clock sounds in the white noise list, for those who want that Pomodoro studious vibe. A low pitch slow clock sound would be incredible, and make this app worth 10 stars! Thank you for this perfect app!

Nice app for tracking process and building strong habits. I like the simple yet effective layout and colour scheme. Very motivating. Includes some gentle white noises for every situation. You can prioritize and colour code tasks. I really appreciate this app and the fact that it is free! One thing I would suggest is that you can recurr tasks so that you don't need to keep setting the same tasks so often. Overall, a great minimalistic productivity app I highly recommend!

This app is super helpful, Beautiful UI and excellent small learning tips. It would be Excellent great if it would lock screen on the Pomodoro timer--without it the function is useless. You lose track of time and don't stay on task if you're working/in flow. I've stopped using bc this kept happening and hope the developers adjust it in future updates. üôèüèº‚ú®

the app itself is so cute and its very functional. it is also very effective and i love that there are multiple choices for the white noise. the design is very cute and app itself is superb. the ads is kinda okay since its understandable.

I love this app sooo much but i wish the stats section would be more advanced and i would love to get rewarded by my persistentcy. And a widget would be great too. I hope you develop the stats, i could even buy the pro version for it because the other things are just like they supposed to be. Thank you so much.

It seems great right of the bat. Very intuitive, the UI is just pure calm and aesthetically pleasing which is great to relax yourself before the work begins. However, I would like to customize my work time more (such as 90 minutes) I think 90 minutes or 120 minutes tops before a long break is great and could be use for some people üòÉ. Other than that just keep improving the app and make it even lighter and easy to use without cluttering too much like other productivity app in the Playstore.

It would be an easy 5 stars if there was an option to change the countdown instead of everything just being for 1 hour. It would also be nice if there was an option that there would be no countdown and that you could stop it when you were done. If the first thing was done, I'm sure many more people would be using it as it is very aesthetically pleasing. I hope you do fix that. Until than I have to continue my search for a good time app.

Nice UI!! However, would be nice if you added widget option for the to-do list. Also if the date and day are mentioned in the todo page would be great as well. Day wise todo list is i think is much more convenient. There's also no reminder and subtask option for the task. That's why bit of disappointed.

The interface is simple and easy to handle, but efficient and effective for productivity, overall making it user friendly (wew I've been looking for this kind of app for a so long!). Highly recommend üíñ However, there's still a lot of things improve on... (Understandable cuz it's just recently released) Hopefully, the developers would add something like calendar support and repeat task so I wouldn't need to type the same tasks everyday üòÜ

It is kinda good app but then it is not mandatory to use 3 hours to complete a task. Sometimes when a task is short and can be done in an hour or so, I click 'done' and then it started to show others task to complete, maybe I don't want to do other tasks for now. It would be good if you add a feature where we can set the time and break time by ourselves.

Great App! I love how easy everything is!! Although I wish there was a way for the app to notify us when it's time to read a book or drink water, or any habit we have added so we'll be able to come back and recall what we have to do. Just a notification option really. Hoping for that kind of update soon if ever! Thank you so much for creating this application!

The App is pretty great. UI is very clean and very less ads. The only reason to give it 4 star is like I am done in 10 mins instead of 30 mins.. save that time. And if i want to go on another task and leave the task I am doing it cannot happen. If you guyz improve it I am gonna give 5 stars

Simple, straightforward and useful. There's still some things that I hope I could do like see what I've done to boost motivation to finish more, option to add projects and subtasks, recurring task and waiting for the ads to load is kinda distracting. Still if you just want a timer with a to do list, this app is all it is.

the app is great, but for me personally unusable as it doesnt let you edit the time - its always 20 mins. please add an option to change the time interval :( (previous review: absolutely beautiful, just looking at this piece of art makes me so calm and almost like im meditating. please, please treat ur designers with something sweet, this is brilliant work! )

I've recently started using this app, and I'm loving it so far! It's simplistic, easy to use, and I'm in love with the layout. Even better is the attention to detail such as when you click on the "Todo" and "Done" buttons on the home screen, and the haptic feedback shows where you tapped on the button. The only complaint I have about the app is that it doesn't seem to have a login feature, and therefore no way to save your progress. However, this is only a minor setback to a great app.

The app is adorable, it makes me super productive and willing to study :) The white noise are super helpful too Looking forward to more white noise :) Also can you plz add an app blocking feature , with some whitelisted apps to use while the phone is locked, cause sometimes I get distracted by some apps and social media, this feature will really be helpful:)) Ty in advance ‚ú®keep up the spirit üåª

Omo, it's just perfect... the best productivity app. 100% free app meaning all the features are free and no ads if you use offline. And statics are perfect too. It can make you highly productive in just 7 days. The to do list feature with timer is just best.It just made my life easier and perfect... There is more in the app butI can't write more than that... Just give it a try and you'll definitely love it. I Purple you appüíú

I loved it!!! But there are some things which I didn't like..first is that if I set a timer for 25 mins and I'm done with that task in 20 mins...but when I exit the time isn't recorded.!! So if I'm done with a task before set time so u also need to record the time I studied üò´ Second is a suggestion..I would looooooove if this app would ve available in dark mode too....thanks!!üíúüíú

A very cute and effective app for pomodoro!... Everything is just perfect...But can you please add KEEP SCREEN ON option in this app? It will make it more perfect! After all I am satisfied! Thankyou!ü•∞Edit:Well i moved on from this app, but now i am again using it... The app was last updated a year ago....Pls add these things if you can because it is one of the best apps for study!! 1) Keep screen option 2) Black theme (not a priority) By the i love this app and may developer update this app!!üôÅ

Wonderful productivity app! I went through so many of them but Glan works best for me. I loove the white noise option during the pomodoros and the To do list, the simple and beautiful design.. Love it! Thank you for creating it for free use, I appreciate it! üå∑Also, it will be nice to have more nature sounds to choose from for the white noise

One of the best productivity apps i've used in a while. I like the daily target feature, it's useful when trying to manage a work-life balance. It has a good design and they also added ambient sounds to help you focus for free.I would happily recommend this app to anyone who would like to be more productive.

I really like this app! But some suggestions: 1. people may be tempted to give up on the app if some features are locked at the beginning without them knowing, eg colour coding 2. Festure to set deadlines for each task 3. App should automatically organise your tasks by priority and by colour code 4. Simple note taking feature 5. Different sets of focus timers for different types of tasks, eg I might not feel the need to take mental breaks every 30min while doing something I enjoy, eg reading

I like this app quite a lot. The simplicity and cuteness are in perfect harmony. I think the app might become even perfect if it has an option for having a personal account for somehow better personalisation, as well as a student calendar. But I love it anyway.

Honestly, this app is perfect. User interface is simple and aesthetic. The lessons about productivity and habit tracking are a really nice touch. Statistics are easy to see and understand. Simple and effective. 100% recommend for those who want to up their productivity.

Nice aesthetic, terrible name. Sounds like "gland". Can we create our own categories please? Also when you add a task the 1st time you should be able to give it category. You have to create it 1st then go back into it to do so. Also the stats don't seem to be related to the completed tasks. I've completed loads of tasks but do not time them and the stats say "0". It's not clear what they relate to. Seems more like a timer app than a tracker? It's very confusing. Can the stats reflect all tasks?

It's a great app but it would be cool to see the tasks you've done already because I think it's motivating so see all these tasks in order to archieve more. And some more statistics would also be cool. Maybe a feature where you can compare yourself with others like "who was the most productive in a week or month".

Amazing app- I used it for huge projects! So I was trying to find really good apps to help me and make me enjoy studying better since I kept feeling unmotivated. When I came across this, it looked so good and clear (and simple) I downloaded it. And wow - it worked so well, I loved its aestheticness so much and the simpleness that it helped me study really well! For someone like me, scrolling and finding too many complicated trackers, I highly recommend this one! Thank you so much Glan-it worked!

Glan is a simple yet effective application, I had to try so many apps before I stopped at Glan. I'm a pre-med student, and it works pretty well for me. Two things that could make this app even better would be: ‚Ä¢ If we could share our stats at the end of the day, the number of ours we studied from inside the app, not as a screenshot. ‚Ä¢ If we could connect with our friends through the app and do a STUDY TOGETHER, that would be fun! All in all, a great app.
